content: Standard percentile rankings and clinical significance: 1st-5th percentile = BELOW average, concerning for underweight/short stature/growth failure, 5th-25th percentile = BELOW average but may be normal for some children, 25th-75th percentile = NORMAL/AVERAGE range, 75th-95th percentile = ABOVE average, 95th-99th percentile = WELL ABOVE average, may indicate overweight/obesity for BMI or tall stature for height.
